member.name: M:Unigine.Math.ivec4.#ctor(__m128i)
member.summary: Constructor. Initializes the vector using a __m128i variable.We do not recommend to use this method unless you have a clear understanding of SSE2.
member.param: All components of the vector in __m128d format
